Terms and conditions

  • This is an invitation only prepaid membership, which can only be availed by eligible AURUM card customers by following the activation procedure as communicated.
  • Only Primary Cardholders of AURUM are eligible for FitPass Membership
  • Make your first transaction using your AURUM Card to avail Fitpass membership
  • Eligible Card holders registering under this offer will be able to avail their complimentary 12 months FITPASS membership through the FITPASS mobile application.
  • FITPASS will confirm activation to the card holder through an email/SMS within 48 hours of registration.
  • A Member is required to make a prior reservation through the FITPASS mobile application for accessing any partner gym/fitness studio. Only one subscription can be used for a single reservation on the FITPASS Mobile Application by a Member.
  • The list of gyms and fitness studios in the network are dynamic and are subject to change at any time and SBI Card & FITPASS shall not be liable if any gym/fitness studio has temporarily or permanently shut down its operations.
  • The Member expressly understands that FITPASS acts as an intermediary service provider to assist in fulfilment only and will not be responsible for the experience at the partner gym and fitness studio and disclaims any liability with respect to any claim brought by the Member or any third party in relation to any use of/availing of the services and products offered/provided by third party service/ partner gym and fitness studio providers through FITPASS.
  • The Terms and Conditions of FITPASS which are available (click here) are incorporated herein by reference constitute the entire agreement between the Member and FITPASS with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes and replaces all prior or contemporaneous understandings or agreements, written or oral, regarding such subject matter.
  • The Member cannot assign, transfer or novate its rights, benefits, covenants and/or obligations under the Membership and terms and conditions of FITPASS. No person other than a registered Member has any rights under the general terms and conditions of FITPASS.
  • As part of the offer, the Members agree to receive such marketing and promotional materials via mail, SMS, email, etc. in connection with products and services of FITPASS.
  • For any FITPASS related queries, please call at +91-8882-997700.
  • Sbi Card reserves the right to change / modify / add / delete any of the terms & conditions of the offer at any time without notice
  • SBI Card shall not be liable if any partner has temporarily or permanently shut down its operations.
